column2: If there was an app that gave you alerts about what foods have been recalled, would you use it?
column3: What would you want in the app?
column4: Are you more likely to use this app if it were on a computer or a phone/tablet?
column5: How would you want to search for recalls?

column3:
email notifications
no bar code scanning

column5: really wanted a strictly email service
no ideas besides just tell me what's recalled
